metadata.description: Which Olive Garden soup is the best? 🥣 See all 4 soups on the 2025 menu, from Zuppa Toscana to Minestrone, with prices. Time for a soup-off! 👇

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Olive Garden's soups are LEGENDARY. Seriously. Whether you're getting them with the unlimited salad and breadsticks deal or as a starter, every spoonful is like a warm hug. They have four famous soups, and each one is a total winner. Let's get into it! 🥄

items.question: What are the 4 soups at Olive Garden?
items.answer: The fantastic four are: Chicken & Gnocchi (creamy & dreamy), Pasta e Fagioli (hearty & savory), Minestrone (classic & veggie-packed), and the fan-favorite Zuppa Toscana (spicy sausage & kale goodness!).

items.question: Can I get unlimited soup with my meal?
items.answer: YES! When you order an entrée, you get your choice of unlimited soup OR salad. And unlimited breadsticks, of course. The holy trinity! 🙏

items.question: Are Olive Garden soups made fresh?
items.answer: You bet! All four of their signature soups are prepared fresh in-house every single day. You can taste the difference! 💯
